title: Loving Boundaries for Toddlers and Teens
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Dr. David Clarke
itunes:summary:
Most parents lean toward the strict side or the more permissive side, and we can all work on moving toward the middle. John and Danny give a brief overview of the top 7 traits of effective parenting.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Dr. David Clarke's book "Parenting is Hard and Then You Die" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-01-05?refcd=1050201

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/loving-boundaries-for-toddlers-and-teens/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
